name: Cforce2
tagline: Fast multithreaded bruteforce tool that can use words instead of chars!
body: # CForce2 Fast multithreaded bruteforce tool that can use words instead of chars! #### Compile CForce g++ main.cpp -o cforce -std=c++11 -pthread #### Usage ###### Default ./cforce -d ###### Custom Charset On of the key features of cforce is its ability to bruteforce using words instead of just chars. e.g. if you specified "2016" in your list cforce will bruteforce with all chars and 2016 a b 2016 aa ab a2016 aaa aab aa2016 aba to use words you have to create a file with one word/line and use ./cforce -c /path/to/wordlist
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
